aboutTitle: NovelRead can make all your wishes come true!
aboutContent1: Book lovers? Loves dreaming and imagining? NovelRead can make all your wishes come true!
aboutContent2: Read over thousands of romantic novels, which can touch your heart and soul. You can also have fun at the same time! You can read it anytime and anywhere vou want

aboutContent6: Download NovelRead RIGHT NOW for endless fantasy!
